explains: adj. 不恰当的，不合适的
wordGroup: be inappropriate for 不适当的；不合适的

sentences.en: It is inappropriate simply to throw money at these problems.
sentences.cn: 只是用钱去处理这些问题是不适当的。

sentences.en: I feel the remark was inappropriate for such a serious issue.
sentences.cn: 我觉得对如此严肃的问题来说，这评论是不恰当的。

sentences.en: There is no suggestion that clients have been sold inappropriate policies.
sentences.cn: 没有迹象表明向客户出售过不适当的保险单。
